title: Robinhood, Microsoft, GM, Coca-Cola: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Robinhood shares were sinking premarket after its earnings report; Microsoft was ticking higher
body:
Futures are wavering as investors await results from more of the biggest U.S. companies. Here’s what we’re watching ahead of Wednesday’s action:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
